goal_descEN: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
target_descEN: By 2030, reduce at least by half the proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions
indicator_descEN: Proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions
seriesDescription: Proportion of households living in multidimensional poverty (%)

goal_descEN: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
target_descEN: By 2030, reduce at least by half the proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions
indicator_descEN: Proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions
seriesDescription: Proportion of households living in multidimensional poverty (%)
footnotes: Data source: National Employment, underemployment and unemployment survey (ENEMDU) 2019 ; Topics included: Education, Health, Dwelling characteristics, Employment, Social security; Overall number of indicators: 12; Official publication: National Employment, Underemployment and Unemployment Survey (ENEMDU) 2019 https://www.ecuadorencifras.gob.ec/documentos/web-inec/POBREZA/2019/Diciembre-2019/Tabulados%20IPM-dic%2019.xlsx. Data are not comparable across countries because they are based on national definitions of poverty and methodologies to produce them also differ. Country data produced with different methodologies should not be compared. For further details, refer to the source.
sources: National Institute of Statistics and Census (INEC), Ministry of Social Development Coordination and National Secretary of Planning and Development
